attributes.action: Stop using books in school and replace them with rentable 2 in 1 tablets.
attributes.additional_details: The school system would improve as all homework would be in the same place as classwork while also making revision easier and more accessible.it would also mean that teachers and students could contact each other during school holidays or for help with work.
attributes.background: in the early 1900s we used books to write down notes and learn in schools it is now 2018 and we are still using these methods to teach. I think that it would be beneficial and efficient to replace them with rentable tablets.This would mean that all school work would be in the same place.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It's up to individual schools to decide whether they'd like to do this. 

If you'd like this to happen in your school, or your child's school, you could contact senior management or the school's governing body.
